BOGOF.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an offer from a shop to sell you two things of the same type for the price of one
BOGOF.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Take advantage of special offers and BOGOFs in supermarkets.
BOGOF.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: abbreviation for ‘buy one, get one free’, meaning that you can buy two of something for the price of one
